name: Snowball Cake
author: Kraft
summary: A grown-up version of the classic lunchbox treat, this cake will bring back memories and bring up the question we all had as kids: how did the cream filling get in there?
ingredients: 1 (18.25 ounce) package devil's food cake mix
1 (8 ounce) package PHILADELPHIA Cream Cheese, softened
1 (3.4 ounce) package JELL-O Vanilla Flavor Instant Pudding
1 (8 ounce) tub COOL WHIP Whipped Topping, thawed
directions: ovenproof bowl, as directed on package; scrape side of bowl
Beat cream cheese, egg and granulated sugar until well blended; spoon into center of batter in bowl
or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean
Loosen cake from bowl with knife; invert onto wire rack
Meanwhile, beat dry pudding mix, powdered sugar and milk in medium bowl with whisk 2 min
Place cake on plate; frost with pudding mixture
